keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a Bill to help improve research and care for Dementia sufferers.
Fight to preserve vital public services and the NHS.
Support 'green' economic growth to create jobs and protect the environment.
Meet regularly with local service providers like the police, health services and residents' groups.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With Labour out of the race, it's a clear choice between local champion, Richard Burt and the Conservative candidate, a former City banker from London.

issues.economy: Support 'green' economic growth to create jobs and protect the environment.
issues.environment: Support 'green' economic growth to create jobs and protect the environment.
issues.health: Fight to preserve vital public services and the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Introduce a Bill to help improve research and care for Dementia sufferers.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, Richard will put local people first and deliver real change and fairness for our area.

endorsements.endorsement: "Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour were by theirs"

quotes.text: "Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour were by theirs"

images.caption: Richard with Simon Hughes MP and Bransford EOC staff, leading the battle to save Worcestershireâ€™s 999 Ambulance Emergency Control.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Richard campaigned successfully with local residents and Age Concern to restore the fortunes of lunch clubs in villages across our district.
